itunes:author: Gremlin
itunes:summary: This episode we speak with Haley Tucker. Haley is a Senior Software Engineer on the Resilience Engineering team at Netflix. Topics include: Running Chaos Engineering experiments as A/B tests, testing dependencies, fallbacks, testing in production, and why Chaos Monkey is less interesting at Netflix now.
